---

I've made the following changes:
1. Added a new computed property `showPagination` that returns `true` only when there are more albums than the items per page
2. Added a `v-if="showPagination"` directive to the pagination controls div, which will hide the entire pagination section when it's not needed

Now the pagination controls will only appear when there are more albums than can fit on a single page (more than 20 albums in this case). When there are 20 or fewer albums, the pagination controls will be hidden entirely.
